headline: Mobile World Congress 2013: highlights in pictures
text: Huawei's Richard Yu presents the Ascend P2, claimed to be the world's fastest smartphone Photograph: Josep Lago/AFP/Getty Images       A visitor holds the new Nokia Lumia 720 Photograph: Manu Fernandez/AP       A visitor holds Huawei's Ascend P2, claimed to be the world's smartphone Photograph: Josep Lago/AFP/Getty Images       Nokia's Stephen unveils the Lumia 720 Photograph: Lluis Gene/AFP/Getty Images       A smartphone on a Nokia wireless charging pillow Photograph: Josep Lago/AFP/Getty Images       A visitor tests a new Samsung 3D device Photograph: David Ramos/Getty Images       Ericsson's Hans Vestberg gives a press conference Photograph: Josep Lago/AFP/Getty Images       Huawei's Ascend D2 smartphone in a fishbowl Photograph: Lluis Gene/AFP/Getty Images       NEC's new dual-screen Medias Photograph: Gustau Nacarino/Reuters       Mozilla's Gary Kovacs presents the new Firefox OS mobile operating system  Photograph: Josep Lago/AFP/Getty Images       The new HTC One X Photograph: Josep Lago/AFP/Getty Images       The new Samsung Galaxy Note 8.0 tablet Photograph: Gustau Nacarino/Reuters       The new waterpoof and dustproof Samsung Galaxy Xcover 2 Photograph: Gustau Nacarino/Reuters       The new Sony Xperia Z Photograph: Gustau Nacarino/Reuters       The Sony Xperia Z tablet is immersed in water Photograph: Gustau Nacarino/Reuters       The new ZTE Grand S Lite Photograph: Gustau Nacarino/REUTERS       A man speaks on his mobile phone at the Mobile World Congress Photograph: Josep Lago/AFP/Getty Images       Visitors take pictures of a new Nokia device Photograph: David Ramos/Getty Images       Visitors test new HTC devices as an acrobat performs Photograph: David Ramos/Getty Images       Visitors look at new Samsung devices Photograph: David Ramos/Getty Images       Telefnica staff protest against job cuts at the entrance to the congress Photograph: Albert Gea/Reuters
